de.iabg.j3d.event
Interface SceneListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
RenderableSceneListener, RendererSceneListener
public interface SceneListener
extends java.util.EventListener

Defines an object which listens for SceneEvents.

Version:
September 10, 2008
Author:
Adam C. Dick, BSE

Method Summary
 void scene2DChanged(SceneEvent sceneEvent)
          Invoked when the target of this listener has changed its 2D scene.
 void scene3DChanged(SceneEvent sceneEvent)
          Invoked when the target of this listener has changed its 3D scene.
 

Method Detail
